Contact Details: Nick Mavron, Head of Prison, Probation, Reoffending and PbR Statistics, Ministry of Justice, 102 Petty France, London, SW1H 9AJ statistics.enquiries@justice.gsi.gov.uk
Description: Detailed quarterly data on offenders in custody (including offence groups, sentence lengths and nationalities), prison receptions and prison releases, adjudications, licence recalls and offenders under probation supervision.
Name: Offender management statistics quarterly
Notes: Covers flows into  services (receptions into prison or probation starts) and flows out (discharges from prison or probation terminations) as well as the caseload of both services at specific points in time.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as latest version of the link Offender management statistics quarterly: [quarterly period], under the heading Documents towards the top of the page. In the link page page under the heading Documents there are five excel files (Prison Population: [date], Prison receptions: [date], Prison releases: [date], Licence recalls: [date] and Adjudications: [date]), one ODS file (Probation: [date]) and a csv zip file (CSV dataset and variable guide) that contain the related data. The CSV zip file contains four data and one descriptive csv files which may reflect all the data held within the excel and ODS files.
Sizing Notes: Structured tables with multiple dimensions, subdimensions and footnotes. Data spread across five excel files and one ODS file but with a CSV zip file that holds four data and one descriptive CSV files, which may contain all the data present in the excel and ODS files.
